attributes.additional_details: To save the last elements of our economy and the relationship with our largest trading partner.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. The UK has left the EU and so revoking Article 50 would have no legal effect. 
	
You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552263
